short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that combines the mission statement of a company and a generic value proposition of a user into a one paragraph response.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ATS Crusher combines two user inputs to create an AI generated response. The first input is the targeted company's mission statement. The second input is the users generic value proposition. When you click generate response. An advanced AI will create a text response that can be used to initiate a conversation with that target company based on what the user inputted in the previous two inputs.
